news.title: Exploding the drug deadlock: Repurposing nitroglycerin for anti-cancer treatments
news.summary: ( ecancermedicalscience ) In the latest study in ecancermedicalscience, researchers find that nitroglycerin is the latest in a series of medicines that could be repurposed to treat cancer. In particular, it targets tumor hypoxia -- which could make anti-ca

news.title: Exploding the drug deadlock: Repurposing nitroglycerin for anti-cancer treatments
news.summary: For over a century, nitroglycerin has been used medically – particularly in the treatment of angina, or chest pain. It is a safe, cheap and effective treatment. Now, according to the latest study in ecancermedicalscience, researchers find that nitroglyceri

news.title: Exploding the drug deadlock: Repurposing nitroglycerin for anti-cancer treatments
news.summary: Using nitroglycerin -- a medicine used for chest pain -- to fight cancer? That's dynamite!
